CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​Output.​Components.​ClassView
public static
CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​Output.​Components.​ClassView

A static class that merges all the Topics from a class into one coherent list, even if they come from multiple files.

Threading: Thread Safe

This class can be used by more than one thread at a time.

Functions
MergeTopics
public static void MergeTopics (
List<Topic> topics,
Builder builder
)

Takes a list of Topics that come from the same class but multiple source files and combines them into a single coherent list.  It assumes all topics from a single file will be consecutive, but otherwise the groups of topics can be in any order.

FindDuplicateTopic
private static int FindDuplicateTopic (
Topic topic,
List<Topic> listToSearch,
Builder builder
)

Returns the index of a topic that defines the same code element as the passed one, or -1 if there isn't any.  Topics are considered duplicates if Language.IsSameCodeElement returns true.

CountEmbeddedTopics
private static int CountEmbeddedTopics (
List<Topic> topicList,
int index
)

Returns the number of embedded topics that follow the one at list index.

GetTopicGroups
private static GroupedTopics GetTopicGroups (
List<Topic> topics,
int startingIndex = 0,
bool groupByFileID = true
)

Returns a list of TopicGroups for the passed Topics.
